name: Upside Down (itch) (upsidedowngame)
description: The game is taking place in a small-town Nizhegorodka, USSR in the 1980s. But as you may not expect while running through the woods, you may accidentally fall into another dimension – the Upside Down, a dark, creepy, and dangerous world. There are face-less creatures, the Demogorgons, who are prepared to attack you. And, as the name says, the whole world is upside down, so, the gravity is reversed when you enter the dimension. This PC 2D running platformer is going to pull you into the action as you get into the character – teenage boy Alexander, who is running for his life and trying to save a girl - Eugenia who went missing a few days ago.
